2016-1672 (La. 9/7/16)

STATE of Louisiana v. Marcus HARRIS NO. 2016-KD-1672 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 7, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. K, No. 14-4496; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 2016-K-517

| TStay denied. Writ denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
